it.polimi.se2019.Controller.Adrenalina

Class Check

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.Controller.Adrenalina.Check

  • public class Check
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains all the methods used to check if an interaction during the game is legit.

      • Check

        public Check()

    • Method Detail

      • death

        public static int death(Player damaged)
        Checks if a player has sustained enough damage to be declared dead.
        Parameters:
        damaged - is the player that receives damage.
        Returns:
        an int value. 0 if the player hasn't been damaged enough to die, 1 if the player receives damage only to die, 2 if the attacker overkills.

      • resolveBoard

        public static void resolveBoard(Player killed,
                                boolean overkill)
        When a player kills another player, this method resolves the board and assigns the players their scores.
        Parameters:
        killed - the defeated player whose board needs to be resolved.

      • markers

        public static void markers(Player active,
                           Player passive)
        Checks if the player that is being attacked has markers to add to the total damage.
        Parameters:
        active - is the attacker, used to look for attacker's markers.
        passive - is the player being attacked that needs te markers check to resolve total damage.

      • affordable

        public static boolean affordable(Player player,
                                 Rybamount cost)
        Generic check: if the player can afford the cost,returns true.
        Parameters:
        player - the buyer
        cost - the cost
        Returns:
        true if the player can afford the cost

      • limitAmmoCubes

        public static void limitAmmoCubes(Player player)
        Runs to limit the total amount of ammo per color to 3 ammos. For example, if a player has more than 3 red ammo cubes this method will return the amount of cubes to 3.
        Parameters:
        player - is the player to be checked.

      • limitPowerUp

        public static boolean limitPowerUp(Player player)
        Checks if a player has reached the limit of powerUps he can keep
        Parameters:
        player - is the player to be checked.

      • limitMarkers

        public static void limitMarkers(Player defender,
                                Player attacker)
        A player can place up to 3 markers on each enemy playerboard, and the player can have up to 3 marker from each other player. This method runs to check if the number of markers has reached limit and fix it.
        Parameters:
        defender - is who has the markers to check
        attacker - is who gives the markers

      • visiblePlayers

        public static java.util.concurrent.CopyOnWriteArrayList<Player> visiblePlayers(Player player)
        Returns an CopyOnWriteArrayList containing all the players in the field of view of a player.
        Parameters:
        player - is the player that needs the fov check.
        Returns:
        all the others players that are in the fov.

      • reachableCells

        public static java.util.concurrent.CopyOnWriteArrayList<Cell> reachableCells(Player player,
                                                                             int steps)
        Returns all the cells that are a maximum of n steps away from player.
        Parameters:
        player - is the player that wants the check to move.
        steps - is the number of steps to do.
        Returns:
        an CopyOnWriteArrayList of reachable cells.

      • checkFrenzy

        public static boolean checkFrenzy()
        This method checks if there are the conditions to perform the final frenzy.
        Returns:
        true if final frenzy can start, else otherwise.

      • resolveFrenzyboard

        public static void resolveFrenzyboard(Player killed,
                                      boolean overkill)
        This method resolves a board in the final franzy mode.
        Parameters:
        killed - is the player whom board has to be resolved.
        overkill - is true if the player has been overkilled, else otherwise.

      • winner

        public static void winner()
        This method runs after the final frenzy, and checks (/resolve) all the last points remaining on the board. Then it proceeds to sum up the points of each player and declare a winner (or a chart with the points of all the players).

      • isSpawn

        public static boolean isSpawn(Cell cell)
        Verifies if a cell is a spawn or not
        Parameters:
        cell - is the cell to check
        Returns:
        true if it's a spawn, false otherwise

      • visibleSquares

        public static java.util.concurrent.CopyOnWriteArrayList<Cell> visibleSquares(Player user)
        this method is used to check which cells are visible by a player
        Parameters:
        user - is who has to check the visible cells.
        Returns:
        an array containins the visible cells.

      • canShot

        public static boolean canShot(Player player)
        Checks if the user can perform the shot action
        Parameters:
        player - is the user
        Returns:
        true if he can shot, false otherwise

      • canShotEnhanced

        public static boolean canShotEnhanced(Player player)
        This method check if the enhanced shot can be performed
        Parameters:
        player - is who has to shoot
        Returns:
        true if he can shoot enhanced, false otherwise

      • canShotFrenzy

        public static boolean canShotFrenzy(Player player)
        This method checks if the player can shot in the frenzy mode.
        Parameters:
        player - is who has to shot.
        Returns:
        true if player has targets and his weapon is charged or chargeable.

      • canShotEnhancedFrenzy

        public static boolean canShotEnhancedFrenzy(Player player)
        This method checks if the user can perform the enhanced frenzy shot
        Parameters:
        player - is the user
        Returns:
        true if he can perform it, else otherwise

      • moveManager

        public static java.util.concurrent.CopyOnWriteArrayList<Cell> moveManager(Player player,
                                                                          int steps)
        This method manages the move action.
        Parameters:
        player - is who has to move.
        steps - are the steps he decides to do.
        Returns:
        the list of cells reachable with exactly n steps.
